snippet.title: Night Terrors: Bloody Mary - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
For more information please visit - http://www.nightterrorsapp.com

“Night Terrors: Bloody Mary” is the next edition of “Night Terrors: The Beginning,” the popular AR mobile game that has close to half-a-million downloads and has ranked in the top 10 overall apps on iOS across 33 countries.

Targeted to go live in the US and internationally, “Night Terrors” uses state-of-the-art augmented reality (AR) mobile technology to immerse you into a real-life survival horror game by taking the player’s environment, mapping it and filling it with terrifying creatures – ghouls, ghosts and other petrifying entities. The technology then uses your device’s camera and LED light to create personalized scares by manipulating devices sending eerie text messages, phone calls, photos/videos, and further enhancing the experience with 360 audio.

Look for Night Terrors: Bloody Mary on iOS and Android coming Fall 2018!
